Function to calculate intrawell prediction interval

Function to calculate intrawell prediction interval

intra_pred_int(df, analysis_result, wells, params, bkgd_dates, comp_dates,
  non_detect = c(15, 50), cen_method = "mle", intra.conf.level = 0.95,
  simultaneous = TRUE, SWFPR = NULL, ...)

Arguments

df

data frame of groundwater data

analysis_result

name of column containing analysis results

wells

vector of wells to be included

params

vector of constituents to be included

bkgd_dates

background data date range

comp_dates

compliance data date range

intra.conf.level

confidence level

SWFPR

Site-Wide False Positive Rate. If supplied, then intra.conf.level is computed using (1 - SWFPR)^(1/(nc*nw)) where nc is the number of constituents and nw is the number of wells

Contents

  • Arguments
